I will try it someday.

Hypatos reboot is complete, upload will follow momentarily!

You seem to be brilliant at making planets so im going to make a bit of a request... perhaps you could make a proper analogue of our solar system? With all the gas giants and Pluto and another much smaller moon for duna? and if you want to maybe make a very sparse astorid belt (i mean with like 5-10 asteroids or something around the area of dres) This is a big request i know so feel free to completely ignore it XD

You seem to be brilliant at making planets so im going to make a bit of a request... perhaps you could make a proper analogue of our solar system? With all the gas giants and Pluto and another much smaller moon for duna? and if you want to maybe make a very sparse astorid belt (i mean with like 5-10 asteroids or something around the area of dres) This is a big request i know so feel free to completely ignore it XD

Hmm, I may run into some RAM issues there, seeing as though I have trouble running all three of my systems as is. I may try making the analogue planets sometime in the future, but I would probably need some collaborative assistance from other Planet creators

But for the time being, check out Real solar system with the universe replacer mod, that has the planets.

So I just updated the moon Miranda's texture, should it stay, or should I make it seem more...resolute?

Update: yeah, the texture was really bugging me and I felt I could do much better, so I did. New texture with better detail is what Miranda has, check it out!
